item.title: My Biology Career
item.description: Rothman Lab, MCDB Department Where I worked for 2 years! Me in Summer 2018! C. elegans (nematodes) are raised here in sealed plates. Each plate is denoted with date and temperature preserved, and C. elegans' type. Synchronize C. elegans embryos. Design chemotaxis experiments and examine social behavior of C.

item.title: Physics Experiment
item.description: Electrons (blue laser) are balanced with gravitational force Photo by my lab teammate: Tairan Zhang The Cavendish Experiment Measured the gravitational constant by the torsional balance equipment (with my friend/teammate Rohit Penumarti)! Movement of pendulum is recorded by camera and fitted on Matlab It takes several hours to wait until the pendulum setting down: it seems damping accidently due to external force.
